choices: Tai, Matt, and Sora!
Mimi and Yolei!
Cody and Joe
Davis, TK, and Kari
Izzy and Ken!
1.content:
You wake up with a start. Nightmares again. Curse them. Curse them good. You sigh, glancing over at the clock. 3:28 AM. Your heart is pounding too fast for you to want to go back to sleep. So, you get up and move over to your computer, do a little late-night surfing. However, as you continue, you can feel your eyelids getting heavier and heavier. A bright flash from your computer gets your attention and wakes you up fully. Peering down at the corner of the screen, you see that a tiny monitor has appeared. Moving your mouse over to click it, the screen suddenly seems to have an implosion impact in the middle, and a vacuum-like force drawing you into the monitor!! Before you can scream, you black out.

When you come to, you can see huge, green trees surrounding you, engulfing you. When your eyes focus, you can see that they aren't trees at all. They're blades of grass. You're surrounded by grass! You've shrunk to a mere two inches tall! Before you can get your mind to how this happened, the ground rumbles beneath your feet. You turn quickly and gasp upon seeing a gigantic version of...
1.title: Downsizin'

choices: Tai
Matt
Sora
11.content:
Tai Kamiya, Matt Ishida, and Sora Takenouchi. Your eyes widen even more so. Aren't they... from Digimon? What are they doing here? More to the point, where are YOU? And why the hell are you so small? You think to yourself way too much, I think.

The three giant (to you, anyway) Digidestined stand near your position. ...well, sort of. Tai and Matt are standing across from Sora, and they seem to be a in a very heated arguement. Oh, crap. Well, they're the only ones around... so, it looks like only they can help you.

So, who do you go to for help? Who do you want to RISK going to for help, rather?
11.title: The First Three DigiDestined

choices: ...manage to grab Tai's sock and hold on.
...lose your balance and tumble down to the ground underfoot.
111.content:
After a few seconds of deliberation, you decide to try your luck with Tai. He was always your favorite character from the show. He might generally think he's always right, but he has a good heart... you hope. You can only hope that these kids are like how you have come to know them on the show...

You walk up to Tai's giant feet and look at him, and whistle softly under your breath. He's cute, but damn if he isn't intimidating at this size. Judging yourself by his shoes, you estimate that you've shrunk to only three inches tall! As far as you're concerned, this kid's well over a hundred feet tall!

You shout up at Tai, but he doesn't even notice - your tiny voice would be drowned out by normal conversation, let alone a shouting match like Tai and Matt have going on. Lovely. You decide you're just going to have to climb up Tai to get his attention. As you grab one of his shoelaces to brace yourself for climbing on top of his shoe, you think to yourself that it's a good thing fabric has a lot of rough handholds for someone your size - and hopefully you're small enough to escape injury if you fall.

You manage to climb on top of Tai's right foot, standing in front of his sock as it rises out of his shoe into the hem of his pants. You are wrinkling your nose at the slight smell as you stand there, trying to get up the courage to start the long climb, when Matt pushes Tai and causes him to take an unexpected step back - because like an idiot, you weren't paying attention to their argument. Startled, you...
111.title: Mr. Kamiya

choices: Rappel to the side
Free-Fall
1111.content:
You yelp out as Tai moves, but manage to keep a firm, tight grasp on the sock. Whew. That was close. A little TOO close. Looking up, you see just how much father you have to go. Climbing up his sock, you reach the bottom of his pant leg. Quickly, you latch onto it and continue the journey upward as the arguement becomes heated even moreso. You're a mere fly on the wall... well, more like a tiny bug on the outside of Tai's pants. However, upon reaching his thigh, his fingers brush against you. Instantly he looks down.

"A BUG!" he yelps panicked, lifting his hand to smash you.

Split second desicion. You know he won't miss. You can try to rappel to the side. Or, you can be a bit more dangerous and let go, hoping to grab onto the pants below. Your choice?
1111.title: Journey up the Kamiya

choices: Matt leaves on his own, leaving Tai and Sora
Matt leaves with Tai, leaving Sora
11112.content:
His hand is about to slap you when to let go and fall. Your fall is scary as you see the iant's body flash past you. You think this is the end as you see the floor coming up, but then luckily Matt's enormous bare foot, which a moment ago he had taken off his shoes and socks to scratch an itch, stepped into your view. Matt had stepped up to Tai to see what was the problem. You manage to land on his enormous bare foot. A size 14 foot that is now hundreds of feet long to you.

"Matt, thats disgusting, put your shoe back on" said Tai.
"Sorry"

You stare in horror as matt puts his enormous sock on and then his massive shoes. You squirm as you are forced next to his massive toes. You always wanted to be near Matts feet, and now you have a chance.
11112.title: Matt and his Toes

choices: Tai begins to shrink to your size
Tai takes you and him and Matt keep you as a pet
111122.content:
Sora stood up and stretched.
"Night Guys" she said yawning, walking to the gateway, leaving Tai and Matt alone.

Matt and Tai walk off into the bush for a hike.

They walk for a while until they sit down and rest. Sitting faing eah other, with their legs next to each other. Tai kicked off his shoes and peeled off his socks and then stretched out and dozed.

Matt did the same, and the sudden burst of light was stunning. But being in a sweaty shoe for a while made to glued to the massive toe of the massive size 14 feet of the massive Matt.

Matt lay bak and dozed off.

Tai was woken up by a poke. He opend his eyes and saw Matt had fakken asleep. He also saw what had woken him was a size 14 foot poking himself in the face as Matt slept. The foot kicked Tai again, as Matt lay there dreaming. Tai had to grab the foot and hold it down, but it was tricky. He lay there pinning the huge feet down when he saw a spek. He sat closer and peered between Matts Toes.

Matt woke up and saw Tai at his feet with his fae right by them.
"Dude, What are you doing?" he asked.

"Shhh," Said Tai. "I have found something here."

Tai looks closer at thr flesh between the toe and sees it, there is a tiny guy between Matts toes.

Tai reached out and then...
111122.title: A Nap and a Discovery

choices: Tai agrees and you find yourself a slave to god. (ie Matt)
You find your self in the Breifs of your God.
1111222.content:
Tai reached foward and poked you with his finger. Matt obligingly spread his toes and watched as Tai's face was only a few centermetres away from the large foot. Tai use his nail and even though he couldn't pick you up, he pushed you until you were lying on Matts foot. They both examined you closely and Matt laughed.
"Dude"he said. "I'm like a giant to it. My foot is a city to it. I'm a god"

Tai...
1111222.title: The Examine

choices: Matt and Tai camp in the digiworld and you meet both thier feet
Tai sleeps over at Tai's and you meet Tai's feet
11112221.content:
"Dude, I'm like a god" Matt said
"That is cool. He's so small and pathetic you could crush him with your little toe!"

Tai looked down at you and watched as you were tossed about when Matt wiggled his toes. You bounced up and down the huge toe, to the enjoyment of the gods.

Tai lay down and rested his head between Matt's feet. He rolled over and watched you on the huge toe.

"Lets keep him" Tai said
"Yeah. Our own tiny pet." Matt replied
"Not a pet, our servant" Tai countered
"Even better," Matt said. "How about our slave?"
"Perfect. he can lick out bodies clean!"

They looked down on you and laughed.
11112221.title: A Slave

choices: Matt's
Tai's
111122211.content:
"Let's camp out here." suggested Matt as he shook his foot, causing you to fall of it. "I wanna have fun with our new slave."

"Sure, sounds like fun." responded Tai, sitting up and leaning against a tree opposite of Matt. He watched as his friend picked you up with his foot, his toes clenching around you. The giant foot rose off the ground, lifting you up. You tried to get free, but it was useless. Both boys had there eyes fixed on you, watching your pathetic struggles.

"Hey, Matt. I have an idea."

Matt looked up from his foot and saw that Tai had his own bare foot in the air, its sole facing him. Grinning, your giant god began moving his foot toward Tai's.

Your eyes widened in shock. One smelly foot was enough, but two?! You increased your struggles, but it was all fruitless. Matt's toes released you just as his sole came in contact with Tai's. You grunted as you were sandwiched between the feet of two cute gods. Their feet began to grind together, giving you a good rub down. The sweat of the boys covered every inch of your body. Your hair was soaked and some of it got into your mouth.

"How's it feel?" asked Tai with a chuckle. "Are you enjoying the treatment?" Both boys laughed out loud, knowing full well you were suffering. Several minutes of this non-stop torture and the feet finally parted. However, the sweat from both of the kids had caused you to stick firmly to their skin. It felt like you were being pulled apart. Just as you thought you were going to tear, a sickening squelch sounded your release from one of the feet. Who's foot were you now glued to?
111122211.title: First taste of torture

choices: Tai Tortures You Some More
Matt Catches Up
1111222112.content:
Tai saw that you were glued to his sweaty sole and giggled. "Heh heh heh, How do you like that! He chose me!" Tai said peeling you off of his foul smelling foot. Matt just pouted, "He didn't choose you! Your nasty foot was so sweaty he was stuck to it! He's mine! I found him first!" Matt said crawling towards Matt only to be met with Tai's bare foot to his face. "Not so fast Matt! You've had him in your shoe all day long! You had a chance to play with him and didn't take it! So ya know what I say?" Tai said wiggling and grinding his foot into Matt's face who was flailing his arms wildly. "I...Say...HE'S MINE!!" And with a final push of his warm wet foot, Tai pushed Matt away.

While Matt was recuperating from being forced to inhale the strong scent of Tai's foot for such a long time, Tai put his shoes back on and darted away. Making sure to hide you in his pocket for now.
1111222112.title: Tai's Foot

choices: suck his toes
go down under his sole, and in his shoe.
11112221121.content: Tai arrives home, and after making sure that he wasn't being pursued, turned an evil grin to you. "Heh-heh! I have a foot lover! Well, I'll give you to choices; either , or you'll go down under my sole, and in my shoe.
11112221121.title: Tai Tortures You Some More

choices: Roll back!
Roll to the side!
1112.content: You land with a fairly hard thump, between Tai's feet. That hurt. But, it might get worse. Tai stumbles back again and you're facing in front of Matt's huge feet. One of them lifts with frightening speed and heads straight for you. DESICION TIME!
1112.title: Nuts to you!

choices: "What is that?"
"Damn bug...!"
11121.content:
As Matt's foot quickly lifts up to take a step, you just as quickly roll back to avoid it. You do - sort of. Just when you think you're safe, the sole of his shoe falls frighteningly fast on your legs, effectively pinning you where you are. But HARD.

You scream aloud in pain, the upper half of your body writhing in pain and agony, pushing hard at the toe section of his shoe.

Suddenly, Matt glances down, "What the...?"

Your heart pounds in your chest. Your legs throb in pain. He squints down at you and says...
11121.title: Rollin' Rollin' Rollin'

111212.content:
"What was that" Matt said

He looked down but you were too small to be reognised as a person. He lifts up his huge shoe and lowers it on your pathetic body.

When Saint Peter asks you how you bit the dust, you will say "I died under a giant's size 14 foot as he thought I was a bug"

What a way to go!
111212.title: What a way to go

choices: Wait for the arguing to die down and then shout.
Start climbing.
113.content:
Of all the people there, Sora is usually the one who you'd expect to be kind to a stranger. You sigh, shake your head and start walking. You can't make out what the hell they're arguing about because they're all shouting. If they weren't shouting, then you might be able to understand them.

You get close to Sora and look up. The only question now is, how do you get her attention?
113.title: Sora.

choices: Help sora!
Can you help me?!
1132.content:
So you start to climb onto her shoe. Just as you get to her sock she yells and runs off crying.
You try your best to hold on. She runs to a tree and sits down. "This is my chance." you say to yourself and start to climb her pants.
After about ten minutes you reach her ear and say
1132.title: PLEASE HELP!

choices: Go for Mimi.
Go for Yolei.
12.content:
You see before you the gigantic Mimi Tachikawa and Yolei Inoue, walking over and sitting against a huge tree, giggling and chatting about something. However, their voices are a high-pitched booming. You cover your ears and wince. You can't make out what they're saying. Still... maybe, somehow, they know how you got here! ...wherever "here" is, anyway.

Well, then again, you think, if both Mimi or Yolei are here... then you've got to be the in the Digital World! ...or, at least in the "real world" of Digimon. Either way, it's a start! They've got to be able to help you... somehow!

Approaching both of them is risky, so maybe one at a time...?

Who do you approach? Mimi's a self-proclaimed princess, and Yolei's deathly afraid of bugs. Between a rock and a hard place, you are.
12.title: Sisters In Everything But Blood

choices: He snaps out of it,and try to get Mimi's attention.
The girls sees the tiny boy!
Suddenly a weird vine.. grabs you!
121.content:
Going for Mimi...is the logical choice.You really like Yolei too...but you don't feel safe being around her at the moment.

You walk through the grass,and towards the tree were the two chatting friends.You paused as you reached the clearing,you look at Mimi.

She is wearing her season two outfit,but wearing expensive wedge flip flop that has beautiful jewels.Due her being a tall girl,her foot size gotta be a size twelve or thirteen.She proudly presents her big feet.

You begin to remember of the little dreams you used have about the digi-girls.All the things you wanted to do their feet and stuff.

Her long creamy legs were alluring.Her exposed cleavage is kinda small but perky. And they were subtly dripping with sweat.And her surprisely plump ass made it better.

"She certainly...grown up..huh." You wolfishly said as you watch the sexy and beautiful teenager.And your hand starts ito inch towards his crotch,as he begin to relive those fantasties of his youth.

What happens next?
121.title: Childhood crushes never die.

choices: Enough with letting Mimi play with you...you'll play with het!
Yolei does likes the idea of someone pampering her..
Palmon wants in too!
1212.content:
But surprisedly,the pink haired dritz easily saw your tiny body,and your "touching". But instead of disgust and contempt on her beautiful face...there was a fox like grin that reeked of not so innocent playful and seductiveness.

The pretty pinkette calmly walks over tiny form.To you,Mimi seem like a god looking down at some inferior being. You watched her slipped off right sandal in a agonizingly slow way,and her two biggest toes gently but firmly gripped your form.

You couldn't think straight as the
very strong yet complex odor of sweet bananas and sour cornchips messing with your blissfully aroused mind.

The gentle massage Mimi's toes are giving you were simply divine. Palmon and Yolei looked at bizarre event with wonder and interest in the digimon's eyes,and weirded out awkwardness in the other human's eyes.

"Hey Girls, it seem this little cutie want to have some fun with us." Mimi teased at you as she softly grinded your body to the ground. "Want to oblige him?"

The Digimon happily nodded to her partner, but Yolei begrudgingly and slowly nodded her head. Mimi giggled in a sweet tone as she looks down at you.

What happens next?
1212.title: Mimi loves Admirers!

choices: They see you as a small person... try to ask for help!
They think you're a bug... or buglike digimon. Start running.
122.content:
Yolei is the smart one, so, you decide to head towards her. The whole way there you grumble to yourself about your defective computer and how wierd this whole week has been. Nightmares, bad grades, evil computer vortexes... guess you should be careful what you take for grantite. Your life was normal and you make one lousy wish for some excitement and you get a world of trouble.

You finally reach Yolei. She looks alot bigger close up than she did a while ago. You look up, and up, and up, and waaay up and gulp as you know the only way to get her attention is to get close enough for her to hear you. Luckily, she's sitting down talking to Mimi... mimmi... no, wait... yeah Mimi, meaning climbing to her shoulder to try and ask for her help will be about half the trip it would be if she was standing up.

You sigh, shake your head and start climbing. After about five minutes you've climbed onto her lap. You notice some shifting in position and a shadow falls over-head. You look straight up and see the faces of both girls looking straight down at you.
122.title: Start Climbing

choices: someone enters
1221.content: they look down and u see u r wearing jeans and a shirt.They grab the end of ur shirt and lift u up to eye level.they ask how u got so small u explain to them and they decide to help then......
1221.title: lets help

choices: RUN!  DUH!!
Try to explain!!
1222.content:
Two words for you.

SKUH. REEEEEEEEEEM!!!!!

They SCREAM. LOUDLY. LONGLY. Your eardrums nearly shatter from the sound! Well, that's enough incentive. You leap off Yolei's lap and start running like a madbugman. However, you're not that quick. They two girls are on their feet and in a few short strides, they've surrounded you.

"Stupid BUG!" Yolei yells, lifting a booted foot over your head.

Oh, NOW what are you gonna do?
1222.title: Oh, Crap

choices: They take a closer look at you and realize you're human
You get smashed like a mosquito by one of the girls.
12221.content:
You remember an old saying your best friend once taught you, "When in trouble or in doubt, run in circles scream and shout." So, you do just that.

"HOLY SHIT!!" you shout as you just barely avoid Yolei's foot. While running you think, "Are there even bugs in the Digital World? I thought only Digimon were here... SCREW IT! JUST RUN!!"

You try to run further, but suddenly a hand closes on you. You feel yourself being lifted up and then you see light. You look up and see both faces staring down at you, yet again. Yolei's is of course more scared than curious as to what the hell you are and why you're bigger than most bugs.
12221.title: Run and shout!

choices: Speak up and ask for help dumb-ass!
Shut up and sit down. Don't piss them off.
122211.content:
Yolei raised her hand to smash you like a mosquito, then Mimi stopped her at the last second. If not for the fact that you were too scared to even blink... you would have passed out from fear.

"Yolei, I don't think it's a bug!" Mimi said seeming both creeped out and curious. "Bugs don't wear blue jeans..." she said as she moved her face in for a closer look. Yolei did the same thing and saw that you were indeed wearing clothes. It didn't take long for them to come to the following conclusion:

"IT'S A TINY HUMAN!!" the two shouted in unison, hurting your ears even more than their screaming had.

"Oh my god, look... it's so small." Mimi said, sorta squinting to get a better look at your miniscule 3 inch form.

"Whoah..." was all Yolei could get out as she examined you in the palm of her hand.

As relieved as you are to be discovered, you don't want them to get the idea that you're an inferiour being. Then again... pissing them off might be kind of a bad idea... especially at your current height.
122211.title: Not a bug!

122212.content:
"GAH! JUST SQUASH IT!" Yolei screams and moves to swat you. Yelping, you quickly dodge to the side -- and immediately wish you hadn't. Off to the side is where the hand ends and gravity begins. You plummet down to the ground and land on your back -- hard. So hard, you hear several cracks. As you try to get up, you come to a horrifying revelation.

You can't. The fall paralyzed you.

You struggle for what seems like hours, but were only seconds, trying to get up, trying to move at all. Your eyes squeeze shut in pain, tears rolling from your eyes.

When you open them again, you see the gigantic sole of Yolei's boot above you. You open your mouth to scream but not before the boot stomps down, squashing you like a bug under the giant anime girl's foot.
122212.title: Where Hand Ends and Gravity Begins

choices: Joe
Cody
13.content:
As your eyes finally focus, you find yourself leaning up against a huge soft, brown rock. Your head is practically splitting now. As you press your hands against the rock, you suddenly stop and rub a bit harder. The material... that's not a rock.

It's a shoe! A huge shoe! You look up quickly to follow the tannish pants up to a blue shirt and nigh-matching blue hair! Joe Kido... only huge!

"THERE WAS SOMETHING YOU WANTED TO TALK TO ME ABOUT, CODY?" his voice booms from above. You wince and look about. Indeed, a giant-sized Cody stands beside him, looking somewhat distracted.

"YEAH..." Cody replies, softer than Joe, but still loud.

Maybe you oughta try and grab their attention before they get into a huge (no pun intended) discussion.

Who do you go for?
13.title: The Underdogs

choices: You try to climb up the weathered old stump to where he is sitting.
You try to find something you can use to get their attention.
131.content:
You clasp your head against the noise... which probably isn't really that bad, except that you have a splitting headache. "Leave it to me to get a hangover without the pleasure of being drunk first," you grumble to yourself.

Looking up at the two kids, you quickly decide to go with Joe. For one thing, you liked Season 1 a lot better than Season 2, so you're more inclined to like Joe to begin with. For another, you're right at his feet already... not that far to go, by comparison. (You always were lazy when you could get away with it!) And finally, well... Cody kind of creeps you out. Joe it is!

Just as you start to grab onto his shoe to try to climb up it, he sits down on a nearby stump and looks over at Cody, while resting one foot on its heel and crossing the other foot over it. You stumble back as the soles of Joe's shoes loom over you like buildings, and appraise the situation.

You know he won't hear you from down here, so...
131.title: Joe Kido

choices: Cody decide to go for a walk.
Cody sees you and dose nothing.
132.content:
You make your way towards Cody, he is wearing cool sandals you can not believe how big his toes are to you.

You think it would be a good Idea to climb onto his sandal.

The sandal looks like a wall how ever this is not a problem because you are a good climber.

You climb onto Codys sandal, in front of you, you see his huge toes it is like a new world to, there is a slight smell but this dose not bother you at all.

Cody moves his foot as he move it you fall and roll you land in between his big toe and little toe.

You can not work out why? but for some reson you are enjoying it to much.

The lines on Codys toes are cool, you hope this will never end. You want to be Codys pet.

The idea of being in between Codys toes is to much for, how ever you hope this will never end.

Maybe Cody will keep you as his foot friend for ever.
132.title: Codys sandals

choices: You have a ferm grip and hold on
You fall and land somewhere soft.
1321.content:
After a couple of minutes stuck in between Cody's toes you feel movement as Cody starts to get up and you hear him tell the others that he is going to look around for something to eat. As he starts to walk you are shaken out from between his toes but you quickly grab his sandal strap. After a couple of minutes he stops at an apple tree an reaches for an apple.
"What are you doing to my tree HUMAN-SCUM?" a voice cries out from the darkness, you feel Cody turn to find himself face to face with a Teratusmon. After looking at the strange Digimon for about a minute and a half Cody runs away as fast as he can and you are forced to cling to his strap for you life. After about ten minutes of running Cody just stops and stands perfectly motionless. You think this might be a good time to climb up his body and try to get his attention. As you reach his belt level he starts to move again. And you try to hold on.
What happens to you?
1321.title: Adventure with Cody

choices: The shirt path
I would rather travel up the pants
13211.content:
As Cody starts heading back to camp you have a death grip on his belt so you do not fall off. After Cody travels for a few minutes he stops and turns about looking confused.
"Where am I?" you here him say.
"Oh great Cody's lost," you think. "Well I am older then hi is I might be able to calm him down a little," but right before you resume climbing Cody walks over to a tree and sits down and puts his head in his knees. And you hear him start to sniffle.

Now to reach his face you have two paths that you can use 1) climb up his shirt, or 2) due to his angle you could climb up his pants.
Each path has its own advantages and disadvantages. For starters the shirt path has a saying written on it in a smooth material that would make it harder to climb yet an advantage is that you could climb with out climbing past it by climbing the inside of the shirt. While with the pants you know you can climb them but because of the angle the path is at a weird angle, but you can choose to climb the left or right leg to the goal. Knowing that Cody will not sat like this for long you had to choose your path.
13211.title: LOST in the digiworld with Cody

choices: Outside
between Cody's shrit and upper body
132111.content: Will you climb outside of the shirt or between the shrit and Cody's body?
132111.title: Shrit way

choices: Left leg to left arm to face (hopefully)
Rigth leg to right arm over watch to Cody's face (hopefully)
132112.content:
Will you be taking the left leg or the right leg.

*Note his hands are on the same side legs (left arm on left lege and right arm on right leg) so you will have to climb them to to reach Cody's face. And Cody is wearing a watch on his right wrist.
132112.title: Left handed or Right

choices: He finds you in his pocket
he does not find you in his pocket
13212.content: As Cody starts to head back to camp your grip loses and you start to fall. After just a quick drop you land and as you look around you find yourself inside Cody's pocket. Thinking this is as safe as you can get, when he is walking at least, you decide to stay there. You climb a little so you can see out of the pocket and see that Cody is almost back to camp when he stops in his tracks. You look around to find out why he has stopped but see nothing. Cody then pulls out his Digiviece-2 and looks at it. You then see why he has stopped, the map on his Digivice-2 shows that camp was not right there it was a couple of yards further. He starts to put the Digivice-2 away and you see that he is going to put it in the pocket that you are in.
13212.title: Another camp

choices: oneof my firend can help,"
you could stay that size and be my friend/pet/slave"
132121.content:
As he places his Digivice-2 into the pocket that you are hiding in his fingers find you. Cody lets go of the Digivice-2 and then grab onto you. Holding you in the palm of his hand he lifts you up to eye level to see what you are.
"A SAMLL PERSON," he said surprised. "WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU AND HOW DID YOU GET INTO THE DIGITAL WORLD?" he asked.
"How I got in I just clicked onto a strange image on my computer screen as to why I am two inches tall I have not got a clue," you respond to him.
"OK... OH BY THE WAY MY NAME IS CODY AND I AM 10-YEARS-OLD WHO ARE YOU?" Cody asked.
"Oh my name is Jesse and I am 18-years-old," you respond back to him. You are completely mystified by the fact that a kid eight years younger then you is holding you in the palm of his hand.
"Well I don’t know a way to help you but maybe..."
132121.title: Meeting  Giant Cody

choices: kari
1321211.content: maybe one of my friends could help sody said.U say i dont now but before u finish he snatches u up and goes to find....
1321211.title: taken to.........

choices: Cody makes an excuse and heads back to his home
Cody has to stick it out with the others and talk to you later
1322.content:
As you admire Cody's perfect toes, he feels you moving down there and looks down. His eyes widen in surprise as he sees you clearly enjoying yourself. But he doesn't say anything to Joe. He bit his lip as he saw they were approaching the rest of the group. He didn't want anyone to see the little person between his toes. He suddenly stopped and bent down. Joe looked back as he saw Cody fiddling with his sandal.

"Is something wrong Cody?" he asked.

"Just a pebble in my sandal that's all." He replies.

In reality, he had picked you up and dropped you in a pocket. While you were dissapointed that you're no longer between Cody's toes, you also don't want to be found by anyone else.
1322.title: Mine For Now

choices: Cody wants you to explore his feet
Cody decides to  take you home and give you a bathh

14.content:
You turn to gaze upon three giant kids heading your way: TK Takashi, Kari Kamiya, and Davis Motomiya. Holy crap! They're all from Digimon! What the hell is this!? Aw, who cares... based on what you're seeing (and the fact that you've pinched yourself several times, so, no, it's not a dream), you're obviously in Digimon... somehow. How? Well, I don't know, dimbulb, that's YOUR job! Otherwise, there's not much of a story, is there?

TK is walking right beside Kari, and Davis is behind them, glaring at TK. Oh, right. That whole love triangle thing between Davis, Kari, and TK is still going on at this point. Rosy. Well, screw that, you can't survive this long on your own! You've got to get help and they're the only ones around!

Make your choice wisely. Who do you want to ask for help?

When you finally reach the top you feel T.K. start to move and you hear him say, "Good night guys" and he starts to leave Davis and Kari behind. When he started walking you grabbed his shoestrings and using some quick thinking tied one around you as a safety line. After about ten minutes of walking quietly you hear T.K. speak again, "Stupid idiot why does he fall for Kari why does he never seem to notice how hard I try to get him to really like me."
Your mouth drops as you figure out that T.K. is upset that, you guess, Davis is attracted to Kari and not him. You would never have believed it, if you had not just heard it with your own ears. But you realize you have more pressing concerns because of you using his laces as a safety line T.K.'s shoes are becoming untied.
You have two chooses: #1) Wait for them to be completely untied hoping that T.K. will go to retie them and see you or #2) Try to retie the laces your self and listen to more of T.K.'s secrets.

As you start thinking a way to get her attention without getting mistaken for a bug, you see something looking at you and the party of the three giant kids. You can't see it clearly but you can confirm at least a couple of things:

1) It seemed to be human

2) That person is as small as you.

That mysterious person seemed to be looking at you with binoculars, and you have no other clue about him or her.

So, you could either stick to your original plan or go after that other small person. He/she might be either another victim like you or maybe the small bugger has got something to do with your current situation.

What will you do?

1421.content:
You jump up and down in an attempt to try and get Kari's attention. Eventually, you manage to catch her attention. At first she thought that you were some sort of bug, but as she looked closer, she noticed that you were in fact human. She quickly scoops you up and walks away from the other two. When she feels that the two of you have privacy, she begins to speak to you.

"Wow! You're so tiny! Who are you, and how did you get so small?"

"I'm Gary, and as for how I got like this, I really don't know... I was kinda hoping that you could help me..."

"Well of course I'll help you, Gary! I am a digidestined after all... It's kind of like our job to help people in need. By the way, my name is Kari Kamiya"

"Nice to meet you, Kari! Thanks in advance for helping me out... If you don't mind me saying, you're really quite beautiful..."

Kari blushed and smiled. She the facepalmed as if she had remembered something embarrassing.

"Oh no, not you too... No offense, but I get so much flattery from Davis and TK that it's gotten a little annoying lately. Actually, those two have been arguing over who likes me more for the past week!"

"Oh, sorry Kari... I didn't mean to be an annoyance..."

"Don't worry about it... You really had no way of knowing... Besides, it's not that I don't like the compliments... It's just that those two keep fighting over me!"

"Wow... Must be tough to be so loved..."

Kari simply giggled as she put you onto her shoulder.

"Yeah... Maybe a little... Come on Gary, let's go look for some way to help you out..."

Kari then began walking toward ________.

14213.title: Somewhere else

choices: A few minutes later, the three kids start to ford a shallow stream..
Long hours later, the three kids stop for the evening...
143.content:
You know you have to get someone's attention. If you let this opportunity slip, who knows how long it might be before you see another person? The ground may be muddy, but getting a little dirty's nothing compared to death from exposure.

Making a quick decision, you start running towards Davis over the soft ground. You've never been that fond of dopey, sickeningly saccharine lovebirds. And besides, they're walking so close together that if they didn't notice you, you know you'd have almost no chance to get out of the way. Giants may be portrayed as slow in movies and cartoons, but these kids are certainly a hell of a lot faster than you. You figure that you have a much better chance of getting Davis's attention anyway, since TK and Kari seem to be more interested in each other than their surroundings.

Seeing your chance, you dart between TK's legs and into Davis's path - a few steps away to him, several hundred feet away to you at your three-inch height. You start jumping up and down frantically and yelling to get Davis's attention.

What you didn't count on is that Davis is also more interested in TK and Kari than in his surroundings, and not in a good way. As he glowers at them and dwells on his thoughts, he isn't paying attention to what's going on in front of his feet. He doesn't see you, and at his tremendous height over your tiny form, your diminished voice doesn't penetrate the irritable thoughts running through his mind. You're like an insect now, and about as significant.

Realizing that he's not going to notice you, you try to flee - but it's too late. You stumble in the mud, and look up in horror as a shadow falls over you to see his huge shoe, the size of a house, move smoothly through the air and slam directly on top of you. Time seems to slow for a moment - but you don't even have time to see your life flash before your eyes. The impact smashes you into the ground as you scream a muffled, unheard cry of pain.

But it's not the end.

When it seems that you must surely begin to feel everything in your body break and rupture in the blind darkness underfoot, after a second that feels like an hour light floods back into your world. You feel a tremendous rushing sensation of motion, and see the ground fall away beneath you and fly away at seemingly incredible speed. Then as you look on, staggered - the world rushes back up to meet you. You open your mouth, but have barely begun to get out a small choked sound before you slam into the ground again and mud is forced into your mouth and around your entire body.

Dazed, you realize you have escaped death, but only just - you are stuck in the tread of Davis's shoe!
143.title: An ignominious beginning

choices: Call up to him.

1432.content:
An eternity seems to pass before all movement stops. From the treads, you can feel shuffling about inside the shoe. Finally! They've stopped! The weight upon you suddenly feels lighter as your shoe falls to the side, letting you get your first gasps of air.

And they're none too pleasant, as you realize the shifting and weightlessness you felt was Davis taking his shoes off from the day's journeying. You squirm, hard. The mud is pretty caked in, but you eventually manage to break out of your prison and plop out onto the grass, right next to Davis' sweaty socked feet. Ugh, the stench!

Make your choice. You went with Davis, stick with him.

151.content:
"What's this?" Izzy said bending down and picking you up. Ken looks over his shoulder and says, "It looks like a human."
"Except one that's only a few inches tall!" Izzy said excitedly. "What a discovery! A human that's only a few inches tall! Let's take it back to Real World and examine it!"
"Wait a minute Izzy!" Ken said. "Maybe we should let it talk. Get it's side of the story."
As you listen to this you decide to keep quiet. It was probably the best thing to do since they could crush you in an instant if you somehow offended them. But still, you think. They don't have to call me and "it".
151.title: Examine or Explain?

choices: Why not?  Maybe it'll help me grow again.
I'm not a damn lab rat!
1512.content:
"Well, actually..." you begin. Both Izzy and Ken look extremely surprised.

"So it CAN talk!" Izzy grins from ear to ear.

"Hey!" you fold your arms, "Technically, I'm a "he", so let us go with that."

"How'd you end up so small?" Ken asks, raising an eyebrow.

"Well, to speak truth, I don't know, myself." you rub the back of your neck. You relate to them the incidents surrounding your nightmare, your computer, and awakening to find everything gigantic around you.

"Very peculiar..." Izzy says. No kidding it's peculiar, braniac. "You don't have ANY idea how you got so small?"

"Nope, sorry, not a one." you shrug.

"This calls for some serious study!" he declares, brightly.

You groan. You were never good at science.

"Izzy..." Ken says, "He's not exactly a lab rat. He's a human being."

"I know that." Izzy nods, "But this is a perfect opportunity to study this phenomenon!" He looks down to you, still widely grinning, "What do you say?"

Well? What DO you say?

You cock your head in confusion and look at him with your eyes squinted. "Don't you mean that I'm not going to regret this?"

Ken smiles at Izzy. "Well... that depends."

You start backing away from the enormous kids. "Uhh... I think I changed my mind... I-ack!" You're cut off as Izzy lifts his huge foot overhead and sets it down on you, pinning you under the enormous weight of his shoe! You can faintly smell the boy genius's foot through the rubber sole of his shoe.

Izzy smiles back at Ken. "I think we should start our study right now, don't you?"

The door opens... in walks a digimon... a cute cat digimon with blue eyes, purple hairs on her cat-ears, a purple and white striped tail, and yellow paws with red stripes... GATOMON! SOOOO cute!!!

She looks around the room and says to herself, "Hmmm... where did they go?" Izzy runs and hides behind his shrink gun. You, however, head toward her and hope she sees you!

"HEY!! DOWN HERE!!!!" you scream!

"Hmm? Did I just hear something?" Gatomon says to herself.

You yell again, "HEEEELLLLPPPP!!!"

She looks down... and sees you! "What the?" she tilts her head and stares down at you in curiosity! The moment she looks down at you, you freeze in place!!! You remember: She's a cat!! Cats are carnivorous preditors to almost anything smaller than them!! But seeing as though she's a cat DIGIMON, maybe it's a different story!

She reaches for you.... you want to run, but you dont have the nerve... youre just scooped up and brought to her eye-level!

There's a long moment of silence and you shivering in terror.... until FINALLY....
151211212.title: So CUTE... and yet so dangerous!

choices: Clean her paws
be her new toy
1512112121.content:
When Gatomon opens her mouth she just starts to ask you a question, "What happened to you?"
"I don't know I was just working on a school paper and then I was suddenly in the Digiworld," You tell her. She thinks about this for a second before her ears perk up as she hears something.
"Hey little guy I'm back," you hear Ken yell. Gatomon got a strange look on her face before putting you in one of her paw stockings and hiding. You hear the door open and Ken say, "Come out, come out where ever you are. Wait where did you go, Oh I hope he is not hurt," you hear Ken say worried. You feel Gatomon move quickly and you hear a door slam and you realize that you have just been kidnapped by a Digimon cat.
Later she brings you out and wants you to...

1512112122.content: she lickes her lips and says i am so hungry.I guess i could have a little snack she lifts u up to her mouth and izzy comes out of hiding and shout gatomon wait. she hears something and stops and says huh.She looks down and sees a tiny izzy she lifts him up with her palm and brings him up to eye level then.....
1512112122.title: izzy is not a coward

choices: Tai, to bring Agumon.

151212.content:
Izzy lets up his foot for a moment, long enough for Ken to plant his foot down onto you with a smile. Immediately, you can tell that his feet don't smell as bad as Izzy's, since all you can smell is the rubber of his shoe.

"Now, just stay calm and you'll get through this fine." he says, "First things first, we've got to get some suitable Digimon for you to be tested with."

You squirm at that. Tested how, you wonder.

Rubbing the sole of his shoe over you idly, Ken pulls out his cell and dials up...
151212.title: Digimon It Is!

have Agumon touch you and see any change,or have Agumon attack you and see if it

info.brief_description: The return of the Digimon shrinking story!  10 gift points per addition!  Add & Review!
info.description:
(Based on Season 02)
Late one night, you were sucked into the Digital World through your computer and, by a twist of fate, you were a mere few inches tall! I know this sounds familiar, but you have a mission: find out what did this to you and reverse it so you can go home! You'll probably encounter the DigiDestined along the way, but you're so small, they might think you're a bug! Keep on your toes... and AWAY from theirs!
(Return from Writing.com's delete box!)
Restrictions: This is a PG-18 story. No sexual content or toilet stuff, okay?
